headline: Campaign for Tobacco-Free Kids Reports: Despite Their Claims Otherwise, Philip Morris Is Marketing Zyn to Young People through Sponsorship of Formula 1 Car
summary: The recent announcement by Philip Morris International that it is partnering with Ferrari to market its Zyn nicotine pouches on Formula 1 race cars shows the company is blowing smoke when it claims that it doesn't market Zyn to youth.

content.title: Campaign for Tobacco-Free Kids Reports: Despite Their Claims Otherwise, Philip Morris Is Marketing Zyn to Young People through Sponsorship of Formula 1 Car
content.summary: The recent announcement by Philip Morris International that it is partnering with Ferrari to market its Zyn nicotine pouches on Formula 1 race cars shows the company is blowing smoke when it claims that it doesn't market Zyn to youth.

thumbnail.caption: Campaign for Tobacco-Free Kids logo. (PRNewsFoto/Campaign for Tobacco-Free Kids)

headline: Europe’s Mediaset backs Paramount’s bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
summary: Investing.com -- MFE-MediaForEurope NV, one of Europe’s largest broadcasting groups, has expressed support for Paramount Skydance Corp.’s $108.4 billion hostile takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., citing competition concerns about Netflix Inc.’s competing offer.

content.title: Europe’s Mediaset backs Paramount’s bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
content.summary: Investing.com -- MFE-MediaForEurope NV, one of Europe’s largest broadcasting groups, has expressed support for Paramount Skydance Corp.’s $108.4 billion hostile takeover bid for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., citing competition concerns about Netflix Inc.’s competing offer.

headline: Paramount Sends Letter to Warner Bros. Shareholders Saying Its Offer Is ‘Superior’
summary: Paramount sent a letter to Warner Bros. shareholders that sets out why the offer it has made to acquire all of Warner Bros. is ‘superior’ to the Warner Bros. transaction with Netflix.

content.title: Paramount Sends Letter to Warner Bros. Shareholders Saying Its Offer Is ‘Superior’
content.summary: Paramount sent a letter to Warner Bros. shareholders that sets out why the offer it has made to acquire all of Warner Bros. is ‘superior’ to the Warner Bros. transaction with Netflix.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Walt Disney (DIS) Adding Ex-Apple COO Jeff Williams To Its Board
summary: Earlier this week, Walt Disney said it has nominated former Apple chief operating officer Jeff Williams as an independent director candidate for election at its 2026 annual meeting, which would expand the board to 11 members if shareholders approve. This move highlights Disney’s push to deepen technology expertise at the board level as it leans further into streaming, digital products, and data-driven consumer experiences. We’ll now examine how adding Jeff Williams’ technology leadership to...

headline: Disney to invest $1B in OpenAI, partners with video generator Sora
summary: Disney (DIS) will be making a $1 billion equity investment into OpenAI (OPAI.PVT), reaching an agreement to become the first major content licensing partner on the artificial intelligence firm's Sora video generating platform. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Disney to invest $1B in OpenAI, partners with video generator Sora
content.description:
Disney (DIS) will be making a $1 billion equity investment into OpenAI (OPAI.PVT), reaching an agreement to become the first major content licensing partner on the artificial intelligence firm's Sora video generating platform.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
content.summary: Disney (DIS) will be making a $1 billion equity investment into OpenAI (OPAI.PVT), reaching an agreement to become the first major content licensing partner on the artificial intelligence firm's Sora video generating platform. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: The Walt Disney Company and OpenAI Reach Landmark Agreement to Bring Beloved Characters from Across Disney’s Brands to Sora
summary: BURBANK, Calif. & SAN FRANCISCO, December 11, 2025--The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) and OpenAI have reached an agreement for Disney to become the first major content licensing partner on Sora, OpenAI’s short-form generative AI video platform, bringing these leaders in creativity and innovation together to unlock new possibilities in imaginative storytelling.

content.title: The Walt Disney Company and OpenAI Reach Landmark Agreement to Bring Beloved Characters from Across Disney’s Brands to Sora
content.summary: BURBANK, Calif. & SAN FRANCISCO, December 11, 2025--The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) and OpenAI have reached an agreement for Disney to become the first major content licensing partner on Sora, OpenAI’s short-form generative AI video platform, bringing these leaders in creativity and innovation together to unlock new possibilities in imaginative storytelling.

headline: Disney to invest $1 billion in OpenAI, license characters for Sora AI tool
summary: Dec 11 () - Walt Disney is investing $1 billion in OpenAI and will let the startup use characters ​from Star Wars, Pixar and Marvel franchises in ‌its Sora AI video and image generator, a crucial deal that could ‌reshape how Hollywood makes content. The partnership announced on Thursday is a pivotal step in Hollywood's embrace of generative artificial intelligence, despite the industry's concerns over the impact of AI on ⁠creative jobs and intellectual ‌property rights.

content.title: Disney to invest $1 billion in OpenAI, license characters for Sora AI tool
content.summary: Dec 11 () - Walt Disney is investing $1 billion in OpenAI and will let the startup use characters ​from Star Wars, Pixar and Marvel franchises in ‌its Sora AI video and image generator, a crucial deal that could ‌reshape how Hollywood makes content. The partnership announced on Thursday is a pivotal step in Hollywood's embrace of generative artificial intelligence, despite the industry's concerns over the impact of AI on ⁠creative jobs and intellectual ‌property rights.

headline: Walt Disney stock rises after OpenAI partnership for $1 billion Sora deal
summary: Investing.com -- Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) stock rose 1% Thursday morning after announcing a major partnership with OpenAI that includes a $1 billion investment in the AI company and licensing of Disney characters for OpenAI’s Sora video platform.

content.title: Walt Disney stock rises after OpenAI partnership for $1 billion Sora deal
content.summary: Investing.com -- Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) stock rose 1% Thursday morning after announcing a major partnership with OpenAI that includes a $1 billion investment in the AI company and licensing of Disney characters for OpenAI’s Sora video platform.

headline: OpenAI bags Disney characters for Sora short video app
summary: OpenAI has signed its first major licensing deal to bring well-known characters to life on its Sora video generation tool.  The company said the agreement with Walt Disney was part of a push to ensure the rights of creators in the generative artificial intelligence (AI) space amid growing concerns over copyright, fakes and misinformation.  It forms part of a $1bn Disney investment in OpenAI, that will see the entertainment firm roll out ChatGPT to its staff and grow its AI capabilities.

content.title: OpenAI bags Disney characters for Sora short video app
content.summary: OpenAI has signed its first major licensing deal to bring well-known characters to life on its Sora video generation tool.  The company said the agreement with Walt Disney was part of a push to ensure the rights of creators in the generative artificial intelligence (AI) space amid growing concerns over copyright, fakes and misinformation.  It forms part of a $1bn Disney investment in OpenAI, that will see the entertainment firm roll out ChatGPT to its staff and grow its AI capabilities.

headline: Mortgage rates higher, Rivian to use in-house AI chip over Nvidia's
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Producer John Hyland tracks Thursday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Mortgage rates ticked slightly higher this week, with the 30-year fixed rate sitting at 6.22% , according to the newest data from Freddie Mac (FMCC). Disney (DIS) is investing $1 billion in OpenAI (OPAI.PVT). Rivian (RIVN) unveiled in-house artificial intelligence (AI) chips for autonomous driving to replace Nvidia (NVDA) chips. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

content.title: Mortgage rates higher, Rivian to use in-house AI chip over Nvidia's
content.description:
Yahoo Finance Senior Producer John Hyland tracks Thursday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute.

Mortgage rates ticked slightly higher this week, with the 30-year fixed rate sitting at 6.22% , according to the newest data from Freddie Mac (FMCC).

Disney (DIS) is investing $1 billion in OpenAI (OPAI.PVT).

Rivian (RIVN) unveiled in-house artificial intelligence (AI) chips for autonomous driving to replace Nvidia (NVDA) chips.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
content.summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Producer John Hyland tracks Thursday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Mortgage rates ticked slightly higher this week, with the 30-year fixed rate sitting at 6.22% , according to the newest data from Freddie Mac (FMCC). Disney (DIS) is investing $1 billion in OpenAI (OPAI.PVT). Rivian (RIVN) unveiled in-house artificial intelligence (AI) chips for autonomous driving to replace Nvidia (NVDA) chips.
